hero.title: Nova
hero.subtitle: TypeScript to Native Code
hero.description: Compile TypeScript/JavaScript directly to native code via LLVM.

ultraPerformance.title: Ultra Performance
ultraPerformance.description: Compiles to native code via LLVM with aggressive optimizations. 5-10x faster SQLite than Node.js better-sqlite3.

nodejsCompatible.title: Node.js Compatible
nodejsCompatible.description: 40+ built-in modules compatible with Node.js APIs. Drop-in replacement for many Node.js applications.

packageManager.title: Package Manager
packageManager.description: npm-compatible package manager built-in. Install and manage dependencies seamlessly.

lowMemory.title: Low Memory
lowMemory.description: 30-50% less memory usage compared to Node.js. Efficient garbage collection and memory management.

fastStartup.title: Fast Startup
fastStartup.description: ~5-10ms startup time, 2-3x faster than Node.js. Perfect for CLI tools and serverless functions.

battleTested.title: Battle Tested
battleTested.description: 511 tests with 100% pass rate. Comprehensive test coverage for reliability.

cta.title: Ready to experience native performance?
cta.description: Join developers who are already building faster applications with Nova

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need for modern development

benchmarks.title: Performance Benchmarks
benchmarks.subtitle: See how Nova compares to other runtimes
